page.title: Claim topics and issuers
page.description: Manage claim topics and trusted issuers for identity verification.

claimTopics.title: Claim topics
claimTopics.description: Configure the available claim topics that can be used for identity verification. System topics are predefined and cannot be modified.

delete.title: Delete claim topic
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete the topic "{{topicName}}"?
delete.warning: This action cannot be undone. Any existing claims using this topic may become invalid.

add.title: Add claim topic
add.description: Create a new custom claim topic for identity verification.

name.label: Topic name
name.description: A unique, human-readable name for this claim topic. E.g., Professional License

signature.label: Function signature
signature.description: Function signature for claim verification. Must follow the format: functionName(parameterTypes). E.g., hasLicense(address,bytes32)

verification.title: Confirm topic creation
verification.description: Please verify your identity to create this claim topic

edit.title: Edit topic signature
edit.description: Update the verification signature for this claim topic. The topic name cannot be changed after creation.

name.label: Topic name
name.description: Topic ID: {{topicId}} â€¢ Topic name cannot be changed

signature.label: Function signature
signature.description: Function signature for claim verification. Must follow the format: functionName(parameterTypes). E.g., hasLicense(address,bytes32)

validation.signatureChanged: New signature must be different from current signature

trustedIssuers.title: Trusted issuers
trustedIssuers.description: Manage trusted issuers who can verify identity claims. Only issuers with claim policy manager role can be added.

remove.title: Remove trusted issuer
remove.description: Are you sure you want to remove the issuer "{{issuerAddress}}"?
remove.warning: This action will revoke all permissions for this issuer to verify identity claims.

verification.title: Confirm issuer removal
verification.description: Please verify your identity to remove this trusted issuer

add.title: Add trusted issuer
add.description: Add a new trusted issuer who can verify identity claims.
add.selectUserDescription: Select an existing user from the system to assign as a trusted issuer. They will be granted the necessary roles and added to the trusted issuers registry.

selectUser.label: Select user
selectUser.description: Select a user from the existing users in the system

issuerAddress.label: Issuer identity address
issuerAddress.description: The Ethereum address of the trusted issuer identity contract

claimTopics.label: Claim topics
claimTopics.description: Select the topics this issuer can verify. At least one topic must be selected.

validation.required: Select at least one claim topic.

verification.title: Confirm issuer addition
verification.description: Please verify your identity to add this trusted issuer

edit.title: Edit issuer topics
edit.description: Update the topics this issuer can verify. The issuer address cannot be changed.

issuerAddress.label: Issuer identity address
issuerAddress.description: Issuer address cannot be changed after creation

claimTopics.label: Claim topics
claimTopics.description: Select the topics this issuer can verify. At least one topic must be selected.

verification.title: Confirm topic changes
verification.description: Please verify your identity to update the issuer's topics

validation.topicsChanged: Topic selection must be different from current topics
